actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to further enhance the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Soil and Water Improvement and Maintenance Act of 1990

summary.text: Soil and Water Improvement and Maintenance Act of 1990 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to extend the conservation reserve program through crop year 1995. Provides for the enrollment of: (1) environmentally sensitive lands; and (2) lands that border production fields and are near streams or rivers. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to count as two acres for acreage base purposes each acre of land removed from production under an acreage reduction program and used for surface reservoirs.

titles.title: Soil and Water Improvement and Maintenance Act of 1990
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to further enhance the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.
